body:
This an Android application that uses Bluetooth beacons, in particular [easiBeacon](http://www.easibeacon.com/).

The aim is to calculate the of position of the mobile phone where is executed the app, using the distances from the beacons and the[ Nelder-Mead Simplex Method](http://www.mikehutt.com/neldermead.html).

iOS application can be found [here](https://github.com/Tomfox91/iBeaconPosition), developed from my friend @Tomfox91.

The app was created and tested on my Google Nexus 4.
